Player History
Drafted in 10th round, 153rd overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2015, off Henry Lee (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/30/2015, off Tanner Campbell (CHI)...
Injured on 6/21/2015 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 8/7/2015 with a Broken Jaw, out for 3 weeks...
